Values (incubator)"}]},{"type":"element","tag":"p","props":{},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Scoped values is an API that enables the sharing of immutable data within and across threads. Scoped values allow data to be shared safely and efficiently between components in a large program without resorting to method arguments. Scoped values are preferred to thread-local variables, particularly when using large numbers of virtual threads. The goals of scoped values include ease of use, comprehensibility, robustness, and performance."}]},{"type":"element","tag":"p","props":{},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Here is a code example
